subject: Important: Your data will be deleted in 7 days
body:
HeyGen ( https://www.heygen.com/?utm_campaign=OPS-Data-Deletion-525-Days-Inactive-2025&utm_content=Data+deletion+campaign&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )Hi there,

 

We wanted to notify you that your HeyGen account has been inactive for over one year.  

If you do not log in to HeyGen in the next 7 days, we will deactivate your account and all associated data with your account will be permanently deleted for data protection reasons. 

LOGIN NOW ( app.heygen.com?utm_campaign=OPS-Data-Deletion-525-Days-Inactive-2025&utm_content=Data+deletion+campaign&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )

We'd love if you stuck around. Check out our recent updates here ( https://heygen.com/whats-new?utm_campaign=OPS-Data-Deletion-525-Days-Inactive-2025&utm_content=Data+deletion+campaign&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio ). 

Best Regards,

 

The HeyGen Team

HeyGen ( https://app.heygen.com/?utm_campaign=OPS-Data-Deletion-525-Days-Inactive-2025&utm_content=Data+deletion+campaign&utm_medium=email_action&utm_source=customerio )
